name: Control Bonds
description:
Created by RetroCoder and illusifox
This is the first game we created together
Coded in Python

Extract ControlBonds.zip
Navigate to the ControlBonds.exe and run it

Get to the  button to move onto the next level
Get to the  button to reset your WASD Controller
If a letter from the WASD Controller goes off the screen, you cannot use that button!

 WASD Controller moves along the screen with you

W - Up
A - Left
S - Down
D - Right
Restart button resets the level

 Tiles stop the player from moving

 Control Stoppers stop the WASD Controller from moving
